skills.name: Loyal Flock
skills.description: ST – Each of her birds will inflict 40% attack damage.  When the birds return, there is a 50% chance to recover the lowest HP unit of own team by 10% of Hana’s max HP.  At the beginning of her turn or when there are no birds, Hana regenerates 1 new bird.  At max, she can have two birds.  Birds disappear when Hana counters (only one bird used in counter) or uses Painting Realm.

upgrade.effect: Chance to heal on return raised to 60%
Chance to heal on return raised to 70%
Chance to heal on return raised to 80%
Maximum number of birds raised to 3
